channel.title: CVE Feed for Cisco -- Cisco Elastic Services Controller
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cisco -- Cisco Elastic Services Controller

item.title: CVE-2019-1867|2024-09-17T04:19:38.645Z -- cisco -- cisco%20elastic%20services%20controller
item.description: A vulnerability in the REST API of Cisco Elastic Services Controller (ESC) could allow an unauthenticated, remote attacker to bypass authentication on the REST API. The vulnerability is due to improper validation of API requests. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a crafted request to the REST API. A successful exploit could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary actions through the REST API with administrative privileges on an affected system.
